Class Heroes

com.pauliankline.floopyconnector.BaseHero

Direct Known Subclasses:
Healer, Ninja, Soldier, Tanker, Thief, Veteran
public class Heroes
extends com.pauliankline.floopyconnector.BaseHero
Handles most hero functions

  • Constructor Details

    • Heroes

      public Heroes​(com.pauliankline.floopyconnector.GameBoard gameboard, java.awt.Point location)
      New generic hero is created. Gives standard attributes all heroes have and adds the new hero to the gameboard
      Parameters:
      gameboard - gameboard that is being used for the game
      location - location of this specific hero

    • pickUpItems

      public void pickUpItems​(java.util.ArrayList<com.pauliankline.floopyconnector.Item> items)
      Hero picks up items. Checks current location on gameboard and adds items into empty inventory slots.
      Parameters:
      items - arraylist of items currently on the ground

    • drinkPotion

      x - potion to be drank

    • checkAround

      public java.util.ArrayList<Heroes> checkAround()

      Returns:

    • fight

      public void fight​(java.util.ArrayList<Heroes> heroes)
      Hero starts a battle. Creates battle between hero and highest hp hero close to them.
      Parameters:
      heroes - ArrayList of heroes near

    • moveTo

      public void moveTo​(java.awt.Point point)
      Moves to specific location.
      Parameters:
      point - the location to move to

    • move

      public void move()
      Hero moves. Decides randomly whether to move in one of four cardinal directions. Will wrap around board, creating a kind of globe arena.
